author: Erik_
title: Fun train, can carry 4 Minifig
review:
One of the few Duplo train with a proper wagon for people. You can actually put the Duplo figures inside the wagon (2x) and one inside Gordon. Remove the coal and the coal holder, and you have 1 more additional seat available.

All in all, Gordon's Express can move 4 Duplo figures on the tracks.

Only down side from this set, I find it a tad bit expensive for the little amount of pieces. But I guess LEGO needs to pay some royalties on this design.
